overview:
I am part of 64clicks, a Virginia-based digital marketing and advertising firm specialized in Search Engine Optimization (SEO), Pay Per Click (PPC) advertising and social media networking.

What makes 64clicks different is our emphasis on integrated marketing. Savvy businesses already know this. Successful marketing is about consistent message across multiple mediums. It is more than a flashy press release; more than a great website and certainly more than the occasional online promotion.

The magic happens when these and other tactics start showing a real difference in your revenues. Yes, when ambitious MBAs join with bright Internet experts to design the perfect marketing campaign, magic happens.

And that’s what we do.
